name: @thankorrs/sublime-vscode-sftp-copy
description: Copies Sublime Text's sftp-config.json information into an appropriate .vscode/sftp.json file. The needed Plugin is https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=suntobright.vscode-sftp
author: Fabio Pampin (Copperdust), Fork from Robin Sigrist (simpit GmbH)
